question.title: What is the primary cause of Raynaud's phenomenon?
question.description: A question about the underlying cause of Raynaud's phenomenon

option_a.title: Poor blood circulation
option_a.description: A plausible but incorrect answer related to the condition

option_b.title: Nerve damage
option_b.description: A possible but incorrect answer that could be confused with other conditions

option_c.title: Raynaud's phenomenon is caused by a genetic mutation
option_c.description: An incorrect answer that could be plausible to someone who is not familiar with the condition

option_d.title: Cold temperatures and stress
option_d.description: The correct answer, a well-established cause of Raynaud's phenomenon
